overview:
New Album by SaintBrix. Everything VS Nothing Jan.15

Brandon Mason Chairman/CEO-Founder/Vice President/Official N-effect Records/Hip hop Songwriter/MC. i started my career as a songwriter and MC by writing music for local bands for city’s such as’.Charlotte,NC, Greensboro,NC ,High Point,NC ,Lexington,NC and also for my hometown) Salisbury,NC. by the age of 18 I had already worked with Company’s such as Explore Talent, Rock solid enterprises, and Talent Y2K. at age of 19. I decided to take my Career to another level by spreading my music more Global than local. within 6 months i had recorded a demo of 16 tracks ,and begin to send it off to record labels,music publishers,agents managers,Djs” and a lot more. I cant say out of the all the hard work and effort that i put toward my career didn’t help me far as a musicians because , now i have my own business called SaintBix/publishing/recording.LLC. based out of my home town..(Salisbury,NC)..by me being a 20yr.old hip hip rapper and songwriter. I know that there is only a matter of time before the public recognizes my talent, and discover that SPR.Entertainment and Official N-effect Productions Records. Are truly the next big thing.
